name: The Hostile Hostel
description:
This run-and-gun shooter explores the never ending corridors of a zombie infected hotel building! Save civilians, kill the infected and scale this randomly generated building all the span of 2 minutes! 

Can you help Wesley fulfil his plan of killing zombies and saving babies? Probably not, he's pretty sheepish... But hey! Who says you can't try?

[W] - UP

[A] - LEFT

[D] - RIGHT

[S] - DOWN

[J] - SHOOT

[K] - INTERACT

[SPACE] - START

[ESC] - PAUSE

The Hostile Hostel is a game submission for the GBJAM 9 coded by Bermisham and designed by redkidd. 

P.S. Developer's best score is 4800. The best score to beat is 6000! That's from our one of our playtesters (Mindtty)...
